= Vim Window Management =

- *:res +20* 		:: Increase height by 20 rows
- *:res -20* 		:: Decrease height by 20 rows
- *:vertical res +20* 	:: Increase width by 20 rows
- *:vertical res -20* 	:: Decrease width by 20 rows
- *ctrl + w _* 		:: Set max height of active buffer
- *ctrl + w |* 		:: Set max width of active buffer
- *ctrl + w =* 		:: Normalize sizing for all buffers
